content.value:
I'm going to be interviewed by a student for her entrepreneurship class.

She messaged me late last night letting me know that she is a Muslim & that she wears a Niqab and asked if I was ok w/ that.

I can't imagine how the world treats her..that she had to ask this. ðŸ’”
